pr_title: MULE-18148: Memory leak on transactional try with error handlers

timeline.message: MULE-18148: Memory leak on transactional try with error handlers

timeline.bodyText: Is this method being overridden because of clarity?
timeline.author: fsgonz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+/*

+ * license, a copy of which has been included with this distribution in the
+ * LICENSE.txt file.
+ */
+package org.mule.runtime.core.internal.exception;
+
+import org.mule.runtime.api.lifecycle.Disposable;
+import org.mule.runtime.core.api.exception.FlowExceptionHandler;
+
+import java.util.function.Consumer;
+
+/**
+ * Refer to {@link FlowExceptionHandler#router(java.util.function.Function, Consumer, Consumer)}.
+ *
+ * @since 4.3
+ */
+public interface ExceptionRouter extends Consumer<Exception>, Disposable {
+
+  @Override
+  void accept(Exception t);
+
+  @Override
+  void dispose();

replies.bodyText: yeah, i will remove both methods, since they are inherited
replies.author: elrodro83
